strapiPost.title: Walton Family Foundation Encourages Development Of Diverse Local Workforce
strapiPost.content:
The Walton Family Foundation and local workforce development programs are building inclusive career pathways so overlooked communities do not get left behind as the region grows.

  • Level up: Upskill NWA provides tuition and services to earn degrees and training for the healthcare sector, specifically serving those with household incomes at or below 80% of the regionâ€™s median income.
  • Hire local: The NWA Council has launched resources like CareersNWA to connect students, job seekers, and employers.
